about.title: Democratizing Fan Investment
about.subtitle: FanIndex was born from a simple idea: what if every football fan could invest in the success of their favorite teams and leagues, just like a stock market professional? We are bridging the world of sports passion with the power of decentralized finance.
about.step1_desc: Browse our curated baskets of Fan Tokens, from the Champions League to national teams. Each index represents a unique slice of the football world.
about.step2_desc: Securely connect your Web3 wallet. Choose an index and invest any amount you wish with just a few clicks. It's that simple.
about.step3_desc: Watch your investments grow. Your portfolio page gives you a clear overview of your holdings and their performance over time.
